Posting.definition: the transfer of an entry or item from a book or file of original entry to the proper account in a ledger ;also
Posting.origin: [charged interest from the date of the credit card transaction]

1.definition: the transfer of an entry or item from a book or file of original entry to the proper account in a ledgerthe record produced by such a transfer

2.definition: the actual crediting or debiting of an account (as in payment of a draft) [charged interest from the date of the credit card transaction]
